reactor.core.support

Interface NonBlocking

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Action, AdaptiveConsumerAction, AfterAction, BarrierStream, BatchAction, BehaviorBroadcaster, Broadcaster, BufferAction, BufferShiftAction, BufferShiftWhenAction, BufferWhenAction, CacheAction, CallbackAction, ChannelStream, ChronicleReaderStream, ChronicleStream, CombineLatestAction, CombineLatestAction.InnerSubscriber, CompositeAction, ConcatAction, ConsumerAction, CountAction, DecoderStream, DefaultIfEmptyAction, DefaultSubscriber, DeferredStream, DematerializeAction, DispatcherAction, DistinctAction, DistinctUntilChangedAction, DynamicMergeAction, ElapsedAction, ElementAtAction, ErrorAction, ErrorReturnAction, ErrorStream, ErrorWithValueAction, ExistsAction, FallbackAction, FanInAction, FanInAction.InnerSubscriber, FilterAction, FinallyAction, FlowControlAction, FutureStream, GroupByAction, GroupedStream, HttpChannel, IgnoreErrorAction, IterableStream, LastAction, LiftStream, LoggerAction, MapAction, MapStream, MaterializeAction, MergeAction, MergeAction.InnerSubscriber, NettyChannelStream, NettyHttpChannel, PeriodicTimerStream, Promise, PublisherStream, RangeStream, ReactorProcessor, ReduceByKeyAction, RepeatAction, RepeatWhenAction, RetryAction, RetryWhenAction, RingBufferProcessor, RingBufferWorkProcessor, SampleAction, ScanAction, ScanByKeyAction, SerializedBroadcaster, SerializedSubscriber, SingleTimerStream, SingleValueStream, SkipAction, SkipUntilTimeout, SortAction, SplitAction, Stream, StreamStateCallbackAction, SupplierStream, SwitchAction, SwitchAction.SwitchSubscriber, TakeAction, TakeUntilTimeout, TakeWhileAction, ThrottleRequestAction, ThrottleRequestWhenAction, TimeoutAction, TimestampAction, WindowAction, WindowShiftAction, WindowShiftWhenAction, WindowWhenAction, ZeroMQChannelStream, ZipAction, ZipAction.InnerSubscriber

    public interface NonBlocking
    A dispatcher aware component
    Author:
    Stephane Maldini

      Return defined element capacity, used to drive new Subscription request needs.

    • Method Detail

      • isReactivePull

        boolean isReactivePull(Dispatcher dispatcher,
                       long producerCapacity)
        Get the assigned Dispatcher.
        Returns:
        true if the component wishes to use a back-pressure ready message-passing (e.g., ReactiveSubscription)

      • getCapacity

        long getCapacity()
        Return defined element capacity, used to drive new Subscription request needs. This is the maximum in-flight data allowed to transit to this elements.
        Returns:
        long capacity
